cmput301_17.includebucket

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301_17.includebucket.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    UserController This is a controller for a UserAccount. This class will be used to control when the data of a user is changed (i.e. when the user updates their contact information) --> many changes to the Login/Register activities will be done later to follow the UML diagram. Also when a user creates or deletes a request, this class should be communicated with via an observer/listener class so that the UserAccount model is also updated).
